name: elgato-light
title: Elgato Light
description: Control Elgato lights with auto-discovery or by IP address.
author: wassimk

preferences.name: ipAddresses
preferences.title: IP Addresses
preferences.description: Comma-separated IP addresses. Leave empty to auto-discover via Bonjour.

preferences.name: brightnessChangeAmount
preferences.title: Brightness Increment Amount
preferences.description: The amount to increment/decrement brightness by. Between 1 and 100

preferences.name: defaultBrightness
preferences.title: Default Brightness
preferences.description: The default brightness to set the light to. Between 1 and 100

preferences.name: defaultTemperature
preferences.title: Default Temperature
preferences.description: The default temperature to set the light to. Between 2900 and 7000

preferences.name: nightLightBrightness
preferences.title: Night Light Brightness
preferences.description: The default brightness to set the light to for night mode. Between 1 and 100

preferences.name: nightLightTemperature
preferences.title: Night Light Temperature
preferences.description: The default temperature to set the light to for night mode. Between 2900 and 7000

preferences.name: dayLightBrightness
preferences.title: Day Light Brightness
preferences.description: The default brightness to set the light to for day mode. Between 1 and 100

preferences.name: dayLightTemperature
preferences.title: Day Light Temperature
preferences.description: The default temperature to set the light to for day mode. Between 2900 and 7000

commands.name: turn-on
commands.title: Turn on
commands.subtitle: Elgato Light
commands.description: Turn light(s) on to default settings

commands.name: turn-on-day-light
commands.title: Turn on Day Light
commands.subtitle: Elgato Light
commands.description: Turn light(s) on to day light settings

commands.name: turn-on-night-light
commands.title: Turn on Night Light
commands.subtitle: Elgato Light
commands.description: Turn light(s) on to night light settings

arguments.name: temperature
arguments.title: Temperature
arguments.description: The temperature to set the light(s) to.

commands.name: discover
commands.title: Discover Lights
commands.subtitle: Elgato Light
commands.description: Discover Elgato lights on the network and cache them

commands.name: clear-cache
commands.title: Clear Light Cache
commands.subtitle: Elgato Light
commands.description: Clear the cached light discovery data

tools.name: turn-on
tools.title: Turn on
tools.description: Turn on Elgato light(s) with default brightness and temperature

tools.name: turn-on-day-light
tools.title: Turn on Day Light
tools.description: Turn on Elgato light(s) with the day light brightness and temperature preset

tools.name: turn-on-night-light
tools.title: Turn on Night Light
tools.description: Turn on Elgato light(s) with the night light brightness and temperature preset

tools.name: set-temperature
tools.title: Set Temperature
tools.description: Set the color temperature of Elgato light(s) to a specific Kelvin value (2900-7000)

tools.name: increase-brightness
tools.title: Increase Brightness
tools.description: Increase the brightness of Elgato light(s)

tools.name: decrease-brightness
tools.title: Decrease Brightness
tools.description: Decrease the brightness of Elgato light(s)

ai.instructions: This extension controls Elgato lights. The user can have day light and night light presets configured with different brightness and temperature values. When the user asks to change the light scene or mood, prefer using the day light or night light presets. When the user asks for a specific temperature, use the set-temperature tool with a Kelvin value between 2900 (warm) and 7000 (cool).
